column4: Hi!! Using eeebuntu jaunty. Any suggestion for a standalone program I can use to listen to jamendo radio? audacious gets stuck, vlc and s/g/mplayer seg faults and rythmbox/banshee are so complex than I don't even know where to start
listen fails miserably! It does not even start if i give the URL or the m3u as cli parameter, and gets stuck otherwise! =(
